casebody.data:
WILLACY
v.
CLEVELAND BD. OF INCOME TAX REV. 2018-0794 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 26, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

PETITIONS TO TRANSFER On petition to transfer jurisdiction of Hazel M. Willacy. Petition granted. The clerk shall issue an order for the transmittal of the record from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County and the Board of Tax Appeals, and the parties shall brief this case in accordance with the Rules of Practice. O'Donnell, J., dissents.
